verses.verse: And <WG2532> when <WG3753> he opened <WG455> the seventh <WG1442> seal <WG4973>, there followed a silence <WG4602> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> about <WG5613> the space of half an hour <WG2256>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> that <WG3739> stand <WG2476> before <WG1799> God <WG2316>; and <WG2532> there were given <WG1325> unto them <WG846> seven <WG2033> trumpets <WG4536>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG2064> and <WG2532> stood <WG2476> over <WG1909> the altar <WG2379>, having <WG2192> a golden <WG5552> censer <WG3031>; and <WG2532> there was given <WG1325> unto him <WG846> much <WG4183> incense <WG2368>, that <WG2443> he should add <WG1325> it unto the prayers <WG4335> of all <WG3956> the saints <WG40> upon <WG1909> the golden <WG5552> altar <WG2379> which was <WG3588> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362>.
And <WG2532> the smoke <WG2586> of the incense <WG2368>, with the prayers <WG4335> of the saints <WG40>, went up <WG305> before <WG1799> God <WG2316> out <WG1537> of the angel <WG32>'s hand <WG5495>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> taketh <WG2983> the censer <WG3031>; and <WG2532> he filled <WG1072> it <WG846> with the fire <WG4442> of <WG1537> the altar <WG2379>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> it upon <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>: and <WG2532> there followed <WG1096> thunders <WG1027>, and <WG2532> voices <WG5456>, and <WG2532> lightnings <WG796>, and <WG2532> an earthquake <WG4578>.
And <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> that had <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> trumpets <WG4536> prepared <WG2090> themselves <WG1438> to <WG2443> sound <WG4537>.

And <WG2532> the first4413, 32 sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> there followed <WG1096> hail <WG5464> and <WG2532> fire <WG4442>, mingled <WG3396> with blood <WG129>, and <WG2532> they were cast <WG906> upon <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>: and <WG2532> the third part of the earth was burnt up <WG5154>, and the third part of the trees <WG1186> was burnt up <WG2618>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> green <WG5515> grass <WG5528> was burnt up <WG2618>.

And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> as it were <WG5613> a great <WG3173> mountain <WG3735> burning <WG2545> with fire <WG4442> was cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>: and <WG2532> the third part <WG5154> of the sea <WG2281> became <WG1096> blood <WG129>;

and <WG2532> there died <WG599> the third part <WG5154> of the creatures <WG2938> which were <WG3588> in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281>, even they that had <WG2192> life <WG5590>; and <WG2532> the third part <WG5154> of the ships <WG4143> was destroyed <WG1311>.

And <WG2532> the third <WG5154> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> there fell <WG4098> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> a great <WG3173> star <WG792>, burning <WG2545> as <WG5613> a torch <WG2985>, and <WG2532> it fell <WG4098> upon <WG1909> the third part <WG5154> of the rivers <WG4215>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the fountains <WG4077> of the waters <WG5204>;

and <WG2532> the name <WG3686> of the star <WG792> is called <WG3004> Wormwood <WG894>: and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> part of the waters <WG5204> became1096, 1519 wormwood <WG894>; and <WG2532> many <WG4183> men <WG444> died <WG599> of <WG1537> the waters <WG5204>, because <WG3754> they were made bitter <WG4087>.

And <WG2532> the fourth <WG5067> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>, and <WG2532> the third part <WG5154> of the sun <WG2246> was smitten <WG4141>, and <WG2532> the third part <WG5154> of the moon <WG4582>, and <WG2532> the third part <WG5154> of the stars <WG792>; that <WG2443> the third part <WG5154> of them <WG846> should be darkened <WG4654>, and <WG2532> the day <WG2250> should not <WG3361> shine <WG5316> for the third part <WG5154> of it <WG846>, and <WG2532> the night <WG3571> in like manner <WG3668>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492>, and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> an <WG1520> eagle <WG32>, flying <WG4072> in <WG1722> mid heaven <WG3321>, saying <WG3004> with a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Woe <WG3759>, woe <WG3759>, woe <WG3759>, for them that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, by reason <WG1537> of the other <WG3062> voices <WG5456> of the trumpet <WG4536> of the three <WG5140> angels <WG32>, who <WG3588> are yet <WG3195> to sound <WG4537>.
